abstract: NHL Roundup; Detroit Red Wings defeat Montreal Canadiens, 3-2; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Darren Helm led the Detroit Red Wings to a 3-2 comeback win over the visiting Montreal Canadiens on Thursday night.

headline.main: Red Wings Rally to Edge Canadiens
headline.print_headline: Red Wings Rally to Edge Canadiens

snippet: Darren Helm led the Detroit Red Wings to a 3-2 comeback win over the visiting Montreal Canadiens on Thursday night.
